key_talking_points: At 18:40 remaining in the first period, the Florida Panthers lead the Edmonton Oilers 5-4.
Matthew Tkachuk missed a shot wide right, followed by a shot on goal from Aaron Ekblad that was saved by Stuart Skinner.
The Oilers need to tighten up defensively to prevent Florida from extending their lead.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game is close with a 5-4 score, but the momentum score is moderate. We've had a couple of scoring chances, but also a stoppage and a faceoff. Mixed coverage allows us to recap the early action while still covering the live play.

game_context.game_situation: Close game, early in the first period

high_intensity_events.summary: M. Tkachuk (FLA) missed shot wide-right on S. Skinner (EDM)
A. Ekblad (FLA) shot on goal saved by S. Skinner (EDM)

task_details.specific_guidance: Briefly recap the scoring so far, then focus on the shot differential and goalie performance. Mention the importance of Edmonton tightening up defensively.
